Field Label: ## Conduct Disorder

### Symptoms\r\n\r\nEarlier you told me you might do things that may get you into trouble with adults like breaking rules or getting into trouble with the police or other authorities. I am now going to ask you some questions about this.
### Stayed Out Late\r\n\r\nDid you ever get into trouble because you stayed out at night later than your parents permitted? (> 2 hours)
How old were you the first time you stayed out at night later than your parents permitted? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
### Has Run Away Home Overnight\r\n\r\nDid you ever run away from home overnight?
How many times?
How old were you the first time you ran away from home?  \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
### Stolen from Family\r\n\r\nDid you ever secretly steal money or other things from your family or from the other people you live with?
### Stolen without Confrontation\r\n\r\nDid you ever shoplift or steal something from others or a store worth at least $5?

### Often Lies

Did you often tell lies: 

 To trick people into giving you things?
To get people to do what you want them to do?
To get out of doing things you were supposed to do?
### Often Truant from School\r\n\r\nDid you often skip school?
How many times did you skip school?
How old were you the first time you skipped school? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._

Section Header (defunct): Has Broken into Someone Else's Property
Field Label: ### Has Broken into Someone Else's Property\r\n\r\nDid you ever break into a house, a building, or a car?
### Has Deliberately Destroyed Others' Property\r\n\r\nDid you ever deliberately damage someone else's property, by doing something like breaking windows, slashing tires, or writing on buildings?
How many times?
### Deliberately Engaged in Fire Setting\r\n\r\nDid you ever start a fire to try to cause serious damage?
### Physically Cruel to Animals\r\n\r\nHave you ever been physically cruel to an animal and hurt it on purpose?
### Often Bullies Others\r\n\r\nDid you often bully others? (Hitting, threatening or scaring someone who was younger or smaller)
Was this only with your brother or sister?
### Deliberately Threatened/Frightened Someone\r\n\r\nDid you threaten or frighten someone on purpose?
Was this only with your brother or sister?
### Often Initiates Physical Fights\r\n\r\nDid you often start physical fights with others?
### Physically Cruel to People\r\n\r\nWere you ever physically cruel to another person and hurt him or her on purpose?

Section Header (defunct): Tried to Hurt Someone with a Weapon
Field Label: ### Tried to Hurt Someone with a Weapon\r\n\r\nDid you ever try to hurt someone with a weapon like a bat, brick, broken bottle, knife, or gun?

Section Header (defunct): Stolen with Confrontation of a Victim
Field Label: ### Stolen with Confrontation of a Victim\r\n\r\nDid you ever threaten someone, hold someone up, or attack someone to steal from them?

### Forced Someone into Sexual Activity

Did you ever trick or threaten someone into having sex with you? 

 _INTERVIEWER: Rate yes only if it sounds like they forced, manipulated, or threatened someone else into sexual activity._
Did anyone ever accuse you of making them do something sexual?
If yes, what happened?
_INTERVIEWER: The participant did not endorse any behaviors. End **Conduct Disorder** Section._

Field Label: ### Distress/Impairment\r\n\r\nWere you ever suspended from school?
How many times?
Were you ever expelled from school?
Were you ever in trouble with the police? (includes probation)
Have you ever actually been arrested or sent to juvenile court for something you have done?
Why were you arrested or sent to juvenile court?  Explain:
Have you ever been involved in juvenile court for family problems?
Please look at Participant Card 8: Distress/Impairment. \r\n\r\n _INTERVIEWER: Remind child how to use scale, if necessary._
### Distress\r\n\r\nHow much did having these behavior(s) upset or bother you?

### Impairment: Family

How much did these behaviors change your relationships with your family? 

 Probe: Did your family say something about this to you?  Did family members seem upset, angry, or annoyed with you because of your behavior?

### Impairment: Social

Social: How much did these behaviors change your relationships with your friends? 

  Probe: Did you find yourself spending much less time than usual with your friends?  Did your friends say something about your behavior
### Impairment: School\r\n\r\nSchool: How much did these behaviors change your relationships with your teachers or classmates?  -change how well you did at school, on tests, homework, or grades?
Did you stay home or were you sent home from school because of your behavior?
How many days of school did you miss because of your difficulties with attention or overactivity? (lifetime)
### Impairment: Global\r\n\r\n_INTERVIEWER: What number describes how impaired the participant was during the episode?_

### Episodes: Onset

How old were you the **first time** you did these (list behaviors)? 

 _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
### Episodes: Offset\r\n\r\nDo you still (list behaviors)?
How old were you the **last time** you did this behavior? \r\n\r\n _Code 998 if "always", 999 if "unknown"._
### Episodes: Course\r\n\r\nSince you were (age of onset), was there ever a time when you did not (insert behavior)?
What was the longest period of time that you did not do (list behavior)? \r\n\r\n _(N weeks, N months, N years)_
### Help-Seeking Treatment (Lifetime)\r\n\r\nDid anyone, like a teacher or family member, suggest that you get help for these behaviors?
Were you placed in special classes at school because of your (list behaviors)?
Did a judge or probation officer ever require you to obtain treatment?
Did you ever go to see a doctor, nurse, psychologist, social worker, school counselor, minister/priest or other professional to get help for (list behaviors)?
